info.title: Platform Repository Service
info.description: Platform Repository Service - Sage Bionetworks Platform

tags.name: AccessApprovalController
tags.description: The Access Approval services manage the fulfillment of Access Requirements, on a per-user basis.

tags.name: AccessRequirementController
tags.description:
These services manage the Access Requirements/Restrictions (ARs) which may be placed on Entities,
or Teams.

tags.name: AdministrationController
tags.description: Since this controller is for internal use only we removed the ControllerInfo annotation.

tags.name: AsynchronousJobController
tags.description:
This is a generic set of services that provides support for both launching
asynchronous jobs and monitoring the progress of jobs.

tags.name: CertifiedUserController
tags.description: To become a Synapse Certified User you must pass a test.

tags.name: ChallengeController
tags.description:
A Challenge is a special object that supplements a project, providing additional features
specific to challenges.

tags.name: DockerAuthorizationController
tags.description: These services allow Synapse to act as an authorization service for a Docker Registry.

tags.name: DockerCommitController
tags.description: These services relate to the 'commits' to Docker repositories.

tags.name: DockerRegistryEventController
tags.description: These services process events from the Docker Registry.

tags.name: DoiController
tags.description: Provides REST APIs for managing Synapse DOIs.

tags.name: FormController
tags.description: Collection of APIs from managing and submitting form data.

tags.name: JsonSchemaController
tags.description:
This set of services provide project designers with tools to define their own
schemas to control and validate metadata applied to Projects, Folders, and
Files.

tags.name: LogController
tags.description: https://sagebionetworks.

tags.name: MembershipInvitationController
tags.description:
The Membership Invitation Services create, retrieve and delete
membership invitations.

tags.name: MembershipRequestController
tags.description:
The Membership Request Services create, retrieve and delete
membership requests.

tags.name: MigrationController
tags.description: Controller for Migrating data between stacks.

tags.name: PrincipalController
tags.description: A.

tags.name: ProjectSettingsController
tags.description: The project settings services provide configuration options that can be applied to projects.

tags.name: SearchController
tags.description: Search for Entities on Synapse.

tags.name: StatisticsController
tags.description: Services that expose statistics computed by the backend.

tags.name: StorageReportController
tags.description: Provides REST APIs for generating Storage Reports.

tags.name: TeamController
tags.description: Teams are groups of users.

tags.name: TrashController
tags.description: The recycle bin (or trash can) is the special folder that holds the deleted entities for users.

tags.name: UserProfileController
tags.description: Every Synapse user has an associated.

tags.name: VerificationController
tags.description:
Identity verification is a service offered by the Synapse Access and Compliance Team
to add an additional layer of legitimacy to a user account, beyond the basic
requirements for creating an account in Synapse.

post.summary: Create a Challenge object, associated with a Project.
post.description:
Create a Challenge object, associated with a Project.  A participant Team must
be specified.  To create a Challenge one must have CREATE permission on the
associated Project.

etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. Since the E-Tag changes every time an entity is updated it is used to detect when a client's current representation of an entity is out-of-date.

projectId.description: The ID of the Project the challenge is used with.

participantTeamId.description: The ID of the Team which users join to participate in the Challenge

id.description: The ID of this Challenge object
